body.name: Curel Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, Wet Skin Lotion, 12 Ounce, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, & Oatmeal Extract, Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
features: DRY SKIN NOURISHMENT - Our Curél Hydra Therapy moisturizer is activated by water on freshly-showered skin. It penetrates into the skin surface helping to repair the moisture barrier.
LIGHTWEIGHT MOISTURIZATION - With daily shower application, your skin will feel 3 times more hydrated.
HYDRATE DRY, ITCHY SKIN WITH NO HEAVY RESIDUE - Curél fast absorbing lotion allows for wet, in-shower application and immediate absorption so you can towel off and go.
HELP REPAIR YOUR MOISTURE BARRIER - Curél moisturizers, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, help replenish the moisture barrier. With better moisture retention, you can help dryness.

INTENSE MOISTURE FOR DRY, ITCHY SKIN RELIEF – Unique moisturization formulas with a long history of success, Curél Hydra Therapy moisturizers have been granted the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance.
body.description: Apply daily and end dry skin with Curél Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer. Hydration absorbs deep into the surface of wet skin, targeting the source of dryness after showering or bathing. There is no need to rinse or wait before toweling dry as normal. Unlike traditional lotions you can apply it straight in the shower. It penetrates into the skin’s surface, helping to replenish and repair the moisture barrier. With Advanced Ceramide Complex, the moisturizer helps skin retain moisture to help prevent dry skin from returning. Dermatologist recommended, Kao USA Curél Hydra Therapy Wet Skin Moisturizer was granted the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance. Apply daily and feel 3x more hydrated. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed my winter
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product after it was recommended by an overseas youtuber. It has changed my winter skin. In colder months, my skin is dry and flaky. I don’t like the feel of lotion so I don’t remember to use it. With this product, I keep it in the shower and use before getting out. It is unscented which I like and the texture of my skin has changed-hydrated and softer. I can also feel the differences if I forget to use it. I highly recommend this product and will continue to purchase it since it’s so effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and a little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I was interested to try this based on the good reviews on Amazon. I have dry skin and swimming makes it worse. This product works well and seems to keep my skin moist. It doesn't make my towel oily, which I had been worrying about. I think it's a better way to hold moisture in the skin than normal lotion. The biggest surprise is that a little seems to go a long way. I need less of this product than of normal lotion. This is great, since it's pretty expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars do. not. sleep. on. this. product. Buy Now!
reviews.reviewText: The lotion is a very creamy consistency (not liquid-y) that you apply to wet skin. It takes little effort to smooth it over your wet skin - no need to rub it in all the way! It'll absorb pretty quickly so you can get dressed without worrying about leaving marks on your clothes.I used to apply body lotion in the morning and by the time I changed into shorts at the gym in the afternoon, I'd be so embarrassed by how dry and flaky my skin was. Not anymore. I don't remember where/how/who told me to buy try this lotion but I was hooked day one after seeing and feeling an immediate difference.I've never used a lotion that's left my skin feeling so soft or looking so hydrated. I have a small bottle of the regular Curel lotion that I keep in the car. I swear it takes ten years off the apparent age of my hands because of how moistured and healthy my skin looks afterwards.There are two downsides to this product:1) It's applied to wet skin and in cold weather climates such as where I live, sometimes you just want to dry off and wrap up in a towel. I have tried drying off before applying but it's not nearly as effective so now I just brave those few minutes of cold.2). It does leave a greasy residue that I only notice on my black work desk. While my skin doesn't feel greasy there is usually a mark from each arm where I've rested my elbows on the desk first thing in the morning (~30 minutes after applying). I've never noticed marks on anything else (clothes, sheets, towels) and have experienced this with other types of lotion as well so I don't think it's is limited to this particular one.If you struggle with dry, itchy, flaky skin, or are just searching for a nice body lotion, I highly recommend giving this product a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don’t throw out your lotion yet.
reviews.reviewText: It’s worth the money and apparently it smells great.I have eczema and my biggest issue is not only remembering to lotion but finding lotions that actually make a difference and don’t leave me an itchy dry mess. This lotion really saves the day. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and looking great without the stickiness I hate and the bottle wasn’t broken or open upon arrival. Overall here’s what you need to know:Yes, it works and smells great.Yes, you simply pat yourself off with a towel afterwards.Yes, it’s worth the price.No, it doesn’t completely replace the need for basic lotion or oils. It just saves you from using half a bottle to survive. (I have eczema if it does for you then yippee I guess.)No, it doesn’t file taxes and make breakfast…unless?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wet skin moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several wet skin moisturizers and this is hands down my favorite. It goes on nicely, isn’t greasy at all, has a very mild scent, and it truly moisturizes my super dry skin. My skin stays hydrated all day. With the others I’ve tried my skin would be dry again by the end of the day. This stuff is amazing and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY SKIN, OPPS, I REALLY MEANT, ALL MY LIFE ???
reviews.reviewText: As you can see, this “after bathing or showering” lotion, I lost my mind for a few seconds. This lotion is truly FANTASTIC !! As soon as I got out of my shower, I IMMEDIATELY applied this “lotion” to my body, ALL OVER, especially TO my shoulders, legs & arms. WOW !! My legs, shoulders & arms IMMEDIATELY felt velvety soft. I did NOT even dry off. I sat there and allowed myself to absorb EVERY drop of this “lotion”, which, by the way, I prefer to describe this as a “cream”. It is as rich as a “cream”, then, after a few minutes, I dressed. There was ABSOLUTELY no staining on my clothes, which, to my mind, tells you ASAP, that your skin has absorbed it all. It does and it did. The price is very reasonable.I am older, so, my skin needs extra moisture and a “lotion” doesn’t do it, but a “cream” on the other hand, does it VERY well. This Curel Hydra Therapy is EXACTLY what my poor dry skin, OBVIOUSLY, did need and I am VERY glad I found this. As I said, the price is very reasonable and THIS is EXACTLY what the doctor ordered. My doctor REALLY did suggest this. MAN !! And, I am SO glad he recommended this. THANK YOU, DOCTOR WALKER & AMAZON !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is phenomenal!
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy that I purchased this. I have incredibly dry and creased skin. I saw a huge improvement in the condition of my skin after just 2 uses. Plus, it’s so much easier to use, then taking the time to slather myself with lotion after bathing. I will never be without this product now! LOVE IT! Thanks Curel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I always use skin so soft, but I can’t seem to get it anymore, so tried this and it leaves your skin so soft and not oily and it last on your skin until the next shower 🚿, I told my sister to get her some. The downside is I couldn’t get the pump to work so I call the company that makes it and they sent me a new pump😃
Best wet-skin moisturizing product. I have tried many others (i.e. Neutrogena's in-shower oil) — this beats them all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing ! It soothes & moisturises perfectly, is very simple to use & has made a world of difference to my skin irritation.Will definitely continue to use it & would thoroughly recommend it.

Me encanto la textura de mi piel despues de usarla, pero si recomiendo seguir las indicaciones: sobre piel humeda, pues el efecto se ve muy disminuido si te la pones sobre piel seca. Me parecio cara para lo que cuesta en USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2019
